length gauge yarn 28 sts and 40 row = 4 in stockinette knit picks hawthorne kettle 80% stitch in the round blocked superwash fine highland wool 20% polyamide nylon 357yds/100g serpent 26695 or wisp 26692 1 skein needles us 2 2 75mm dpns or 2 circular needles for two circular needles technique or 1 long circular needle for magic loop or size to optain gauge for pattern support contact customerservice@knitpicks com toe up socks foot work in st st until total length is 3 5 4 4 75 5 5 25 less than notes this is a simple toe up sock perfect for those wanting to the total foot length practice their sock making skills this pattern is easily adaptable for dpns magic loops or 2 circulars so you can use your favorite gusset knitting method for the perfect fit measure around the widest increases will only be on the heel sts instep will be in st st part of your foot for the circumference and choose the size round 1 kfb in the first st k to 2 sts before end of the heel sts kfb slightly smaller than your measurement for instance if your foot k1 k across instep sts to end of round 2 heel sts increase is 7 5 around knit the 7 size then measure the bottom of your round 2 k all sts foot from heel to longest toe to determine the foot length this pattern was written with a 5 5 leg length -but you can make it shorter or longer however if you do the latter you may need an additional skein of yarn for a tutorial on judy s magic cast on please see http //tutorials knitpicks com/wptutorials/judys-magic-cast-on/ wrap and turn w&t work until the stitch to be wrapped if knitting bring yarn to the front of the work slip next st as if to purl return the yarn to the back turn work and slip wrapped st onto rh needle continue across row if purling bring yarn to the back of the work slip next st as if to purl return the yarn to the front turn work and slip wrapped st onto rh needle continue across row picking up wraps work to the wrapped st if knitting insert the rh needle under the wrap s then through the wrapped st k-wise knit the wrap s together with the wrapped st if purling slip the wrapped st p-wise onto the rh needle and use the lh needle to lift the wrap s and place them on the rh needle slip wrap s and unworked st back to lh needle purl all together through the back loop stretchy bind-off k2 *insert the left needle into the front of the 2 sts on the right needle and knit
